availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac T. Whitaker (Letcher County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Letcher County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Son of Susannah Whitaker. Married to Susannah Whitaker in Perry County, Kentucky, in 1828. Father of William Whitaker, Milly Whitaker, Nancy Whitaker, Lucinda Whitaker, Wilson Whitaker, Enoch Whitaker, Malzie Whitaker, and Elijah Whitaker. Farmer in Perry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Letcher County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Perry County, District 2, p. 432A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Letcher County, p. 678.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Perry County Marriages, Film 000968277, p. 18.
"Isaac T Whitaker (1808-1889)," Find A Grave, Memorial 10619956, accessed December 29, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/10619956.
